articles.title: 'You still look pregnant', 'She doesn't look like you': What not to say to a new (and vulnerable) mother - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Do we unconsciously judge or criticise new mothers and their babies? During a time of great stress and transition, some of our seemingly harmless comments may cut deeper than we think.
articles.content: Some months back, a friend of mine gave birth to a baby girl. Now, my friend is an attractive woman, but as she puts it herself, her baby did not conform to conventional standards of beauty. Her newb… [+1100 chars]
